designContext: This project uses a black & white design system. Primary: #000000, Background: #FFFFFF, Gray scale: gray-100 through gray-900. Typography: text-xs(12px) through text-4xl(36px), all in rem units. Cards use rounded-2xl with shadow-sm. Buttons: rounded-full for primary actions, rounded-lg for secondary.

conventions.styling: Tailwind CSS with design tokens — use token class names, not hardcoded hex values
conventions.units: rem only — use pxToRem() utility from @/shared/lib/utils, never write px directly
conventions.imports: Absolute paths with @/ prefix for all project files
conventions.stateManagement: Zustand — import from @/shared/store or feature-specific stores
conventions.dataFetching: TanStack React Query v5 — use useQuery/useMutation hooks
